text.data: Chapter 6 It's Not a Dream, is it...[end]
Matelite: We're going to see the queen of Campbell![end]

[character][0x1] is back. The revival of Kahna is no longer just a dream.
Finally, I get to show her my skills as a commander.[end]

I've washed my face... My armor is sparkling...
Huh? That Taicho, taking the best spot. Why, that little...[end]
Matelite: Huh? Oh, [character][0x1]? Aren't you happy?[end]
I'm happy. It's none of your business.[end1]
I thought so. I'm just welling up with happiness![end]
Hmph! If that's the case, all the happiness is mine![end]
Matelite: I will take the place of the king and fight alongside [character][0x1]. I can feel the flow of history![end]
[character][0x1]: What does it look like around Campbell Lagoon?[end]
Sendak: What should we do?[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]...[end]
Matelite: Then it's settled, we're going to free Campbell from the Granbelos Empire! I can just see the delighted faces of the people of Campbell, [character][0x1]![end]
Matelite: Well, [character][0x1]... there are Imperial soldiers all over the place.[end]
She smells nice...[end]
Yes No[end1]
Sendak: [character][0x1]...[end]
[character][0x1]?[end][end]
Hornet: The Empire probably knows we're here. It looks like it'll be a tough fight.[end]
[character][0x1]: In order to defeat these soldiers, who are a long way from home...[end]
[character][0x1]: It's basic strategy to first set up a perimeter...[end]
Matelite: Correct, Princess! Okay, [character][0x1]! Make the battle preparations![end]
Matelite: But [character][0x1], where did you learn about battle strategy?[end]
Taicho: [character][0x1] is beautiful, but I know somebody even more beautiful.[end]
Taicho: Do you think my beard is lively?[end]
Taicho: You should take care of your appearance too, [character][0x1]. You are all sticky with dragon drool.[end]
Oh no! And I am going to finally meet [character][0x1] too!![end]
[0x2a]scratch[0x2a] [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] Having a beard is what it means to be a knight![end]
Sendak: I can sense a strange feeling inside me... Could this be the summoning of a dragon...?[end]
Sendak: [character][0x1]... You are happy the princess has returned, are you not?[end]

Sauzer and the Holy Dragons... The Holy Dragons and the princess...
Legends and Holy Dragons and the princess and Sauzer...
My head hurts...[end]
Sendak: Let us go, [character][0x1]...[end]
Sendak: [0x2a]whisper[0x2a] [0x2a]whisper[0x2a] [0x28]The Princess is a bit more energetic, don't you think?[0x29][end]
[character][0x1] and the princess, always together by themselves... Love and war aren't compatible...[end]

That's right... since I'm in the captain's room, I'll make some rules...
[0x24]No Love Permitted Aboard[0x22]
Oh, that's no good. Everybody will hate me. I don't want to be a hated old geezer...[end]
Sendak: Oh, Princess![end]
Sendak: I ordered the reconnaissance of Campbell. Everybody is wondering if there's something at Campbell Lagoon...[end]
[character][0x1]: Oh! I totally forgot about that![end]
[character][0x1]: I want to know about the legend. The legend about the Holy Dragons, told of in Kahna. Sauzer knew it, but he wouldn't tell me anything about it.[end]
Sendak: The legend of the Kahna family line? But why Campbell...?[end]
[character][0x1]: My aunt might know about it...[end]
Sendak: Of course! So we are going to see the queen of Campbell![end]
Rush: [character][0x1]'s pretty now![end]
I see...[end][end]
Sendak: The queen of Campbell is King Kahna's sister. Since she's a member of the family, she has to know about it![end]
Sendak: If we learn about the legend, we can stand up to Sauzer. Okay, let's go to tell everybody![end]
Rush: I'm excited![end]
Rush: [character][0x1]'s smile. I'll fight just to see that![end]
Truce: I hear [character][0x1] is having a nightmare...[end]
Truce: It seems she was having a nightmare after all.[end]
Truce: I think you've noticed, but Bikkebakke is acting strangely...[end]
Bikkebakke: I need to talk to you later...[end]
Hornet: [character][0x1], won't you try controlling the ship?[end]
Come on, try it.[end]
Hornet: Do you want to take control one more time?[end]
Uh, let's call it quits. It's too hard for an amateur.[end]
Hornet: Campbell Lagoon... is there still something there?[end]

Hornet: [character][0x1], are we ready to go?
Not yet. Attack![end1]
Melodia: Ugh, I'm sick of it! It's nothing but [character][0x1], [character][0x1], [character][0x1]!! Even Hornet's the same! He's been grinning all this time![end]
Hornet: Melodia, go play in your room![end]
Melodia: Hornet's nervous![end]
Melodia: Grrrr![end]
Zora: I said too much, didn't I...?[end]
Zora: I'll take care of the princess! Leave it to me![end]
[character][0x1]: I'm sorry, I want to sleep some more.[end]
U-ungh...[end]
Where...[end]
Sendak![end]
Oh! Matelite!![end]
Then, this must be...[end]
Sendak: This is [character][0x1]. You are back with us.[end]
Rush: Welcome back, [character][0x1]![end]
Truce: It's nice to see you again![end]
Bikkebakke: I gained some weight. Can you tell?[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]!![end]
Matelite: It is I, Matelite![end]
Taicho: I am Taicho, of the former knights of Mahal![end]
[character][0x1]: This isn't a dream, is it?[end]
Sendak: No, Princess, this is the real world.[end]
Matelite: Speaking of which, [character][0x1]! I heard you had a nightmare. What was it?[end]

[character][0x1]: A nightmare...?
No...[end]
Sendak: But... then, what kind of dream was it?[end]
[character][0x1]: It was nothing. It was just an ordinary dream.[end]
Zora: Hey, come on you guys! The princess is tired. Why don't you talk about it later?[end]
Rush: Right. From now on, you'll always be with us![end]
[character][0x1]: I'm sorry about that...[end]

[character][0x1]: Hornet, I have a request. Please fly around the sky of Campbell.
I want to see the situation on Campbell Lagoon.[end]
Hornet: Please leave it to me, [character][0x1].[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1], There's something I want to tell you. Let's go to the captain's room.[end]
Princess... [character][0x1] is very busy with the Dragon Squad. Please do not waste his time... But I will say no more. I do not want to be thought of as a cranky old man...[end]
[character][0x1]: Oh, Sendak! Let me use your room.[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]... Can I listen too?[end]
[character][0x1]: Watch Campbell, Matelite. I'll feel a lot safer if you watch it for me![end]
Matelite: Heh heh heh. Leave it to me![end]
[character][0x1]: I was really surprised earlier. It was the first time I've ever been hit...[end]
It was just as Zora said.[end]
I was only thinking of myself. I didn't think about the fact that everybody fought for me. I didn't even think about what everybody else thought.[end]
I will try hard from now on. I will try to surpass everyone's expectations.[end]
But, I'm scared... I don't know about becoming a Dragnar...[end]
And Valitora also said this.[end]
He said even if I gather the power of the Holy Dragons, whether or not I'll become a Dragnar is up to me. Whether or not I am suited to be a Dragnar...[end]
If I'm not, what will happen to me...?[end]
I'm sorry, talking like this must be awkward for you.[end]
[character][0x1]: .........[end]
Can I talk to you about other things from now on?[end]
Why of course! Of course you can! Monyoooo! [0x28]No way![0x29][end1]
Matelite, right? That's pretty good![end]
Pretending to be Taicho, right? That was just like him![end]
A Mini-Devil, right? But I wonder what you said...?[end]
[character][0x1]: Thank you, [character][0x1].[end]
...... You sure are young, [character][0x1].[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1], don't go![end]
Zora: The princess is awake![end]
[character][0x1]: Please wait![end]
[character][0x1]: Everybody... please listen.[end]
Matelite: What is it?[end]
[character][0x1]: It's about the dream I had... Yes, it was just an ordinary dream. But I get the feeling there is a special meaning behind it...[end]
Matelite: I enjoy [character][0x1]'s stories more than anything![end]

[character][0x1]: In the dream I had, there was a Holy Dragon...
The dream was about the Holy Dragon Valitora.[end]
Sendak: What did you say? A Holy Dragon?![end]
[character][0x1]: Valitora spoke to me in my dream.[end]
[character][0x1]: He said that if I gather the power of the Holy Dragons, I can... I can become a Dragnar...[end]
Matelite: What? A Dragnar?! [character][0x1]?![end]
Taicho: What is a Dragnar?[end]
Matelite: It's a person whose mind is one with the Holy Dragons, and can control their awesome power! The king was also able to control this great power![end]
Taicho: Wow![end]
Matelite: ...If so, then the Holy Dragons are on our side! Now it's clear why Valitora defeated Sauzer! Now the Granbelos Empire isn't an enemy![end]
Matelite: The revival of Kahna is near! Okay, let's tell everybody![end]
[character][0x1]: Wait! It was just a dream![end]
Sendak: Princess... Perhaps it was not just an ordinary dream. Valitora's mind spoke to you.[end]
Sendak: It makes no difference if a Holy Dragon speaks to you in a dream or in the real world. ...That is what the king said.[end]
[character][0x1]: Then... everything that Valitora said... from now on, I...[end]
[character][0x1]: ......... That's why... I didn't want to wake up from the dream. I wanted to stay in it. Please! Let me be by myself![end]
Zora: Princess! Listen to yourself. You say one thing and then the other. [0x24]Wait![0x22] then, [0x24]Let me be by myself![0x22] I hate wishy-washy people like that![end]
Zora: Don't you understand? Don't you realize everybody's struggled to save you from the Empire?[end]
Zora: And you must have had a hard time too. And I'm sure there will be hard times ahead as well.[end]

Zora: Are you afraid of dreams? Are you afraid of dragons? Are you afraid of reality? Princess... get a grip. And be strong.
But, when things aren't going right, when your heart won't stop trembling, we will all be there for you. Now you must move ahead, Princess.[end]
You got a Princess's ???.[end]
Rush: Where're you going, [character][0x1]?![end]
You got a Bad Cookie.[end]
You got a Drawer Thing.[end]
You got some niuji.[end][end]
